title: complex example does not run under python 3
body:
```
(env)$ python --version
Python 3.4.1
(env)$ complex 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/bin/complex", line 9, in <module>
    load_entry_point('click-example-complex==1.0', 'console_scripts', 'complex')()
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/click/core.py", line 488, in __call__
    return self.main(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/click/core.py", line 473, in main
    with self.make_context(prog_name, args, **extra) as ctx:
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/click/core.py", line 403, in make_context
    self.parse_args(ctx, args)
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/click/core.py", line 719, in parse_args
    echo(ctx.get_help())
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/click/core.py", line 306, in get_help
    return self.command.get_help(self)
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/click/core.py", line 580, in get_help
    self.format_help(ctx, formatter)
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/click/core.py", line 595, in format_help
    self.format_options(ctx, formatter)
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/click/core.py", line 697, in format_options
    self.format_commands(ctx, formatter)
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/env/lib/python3.4/site-packages/click/core.py", line 705, in format_commands
    cmd = self.get_command(ctx, subcommand)
  File "/home/carl/Projects/github.com/click/examples/complex/complex/cli.py", line 46, in get_command
    name.encode('ascii', 'replace'),
TypeError: Can't convert 'bytes' object to str implicitly
```
